card_text: Apply this effect depending on the number of different original Attributes of the Link Monsters on the field.$N●1: All Link Monsters you control gain 500 ATK.$N●2: All Link Monsters your opponent controls lose 1000 ATK.$N●3: Gain 1500 LP.$N●4: Inflict 2000 damage to your opponent.$N●5: Special Summon 1 monster with 2500 or more ATK from your Deck.$N●6: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls with 3000 or less ATK.$NYou can only activate 1 "Link Party" per turn.
